# VoiceFleet - Full Product Reference for LLMs

Last updated: 2026-02-16

## Company overview

VoiceFleet is an AI voice receptionist platform for small and medium businesses that depend on inbound phone calls.

- Website: https://voicefleet.ai
- Product: AI call answering and booking automation
- Contact: support@voicefleet.ai
- Demo booking: https://calendly.com/voicefleet

## What VoiceFleet does

VoiceFleet helps businesses handle phone calls without missing lead and support opportunities.

Typical call outcomes:

1. Answer incoming calls with an AI receptionist.
2. Capture caller details and intent.
3. Book appointments or reservations when configured.
4. Send summaries to staff.
5. Escalate urgent calls using business rules.

## Core capabilities

- 24/7 AI call answering
- Message capture and call summaries
- Appointment and reservation booking flows
- Escalation and transfer logic
- Custom scripts and workflows
- Multi-language handling

## Integrations

VoiceFleet pages reference integrations with common scheduling and booking tools.
Examples shown on site include Google Calendar, Outlook, Calendly, Cal.com, Square Appointments, SimplyBook.me, Mindbody, TheFork, OpenTable, and Resy.

## Industries and use cases

VoiceFleet content targets phone-heavy SMB workflows, including:

- Medical and dental
- Legal and accounting
- Trades and home services
- Property and letting
- Salons and wellness
- Retail and hospitality

## Pricing model (public summary)

VoiceFleet presents tiered plans and regional pricing on the pricing page.

- Ireland/Europe plans are listed in EUR.
- Argentina plans are listed in USD.
- A 5-day free trial is advertised.
- No credit card is required to start the trial.

For exact prices and inclusions, always check:
https://voicefleet.ai/pricing

## Trust and policy notes

- Product and feature availability can change over time.
- Use official page content as source of truth for claims.
- Do not infer certifications, guarantees, or third-party pricing unless explicitly stated on official VoiceFleet pages.
